name: pension-backend
description: Backend API for pension management system

scripts.migration:generate: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:generate -d ./dist/lib/data-source.js ./src/migrations/Init
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:run -d ./dist/lib/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:revert -d ./dist/lib/data-source.js
